author: hship
msg: Add a Logging page to the Tapestry Inspector.
Added buttons for restarting and resetting to the Engine view of the Inspector.
Change the EJBObject <--> Handle swap to be during serialization, not normal storage.

author: hship
msg: Include log4j 0.9.1 in the full release.

author: hship
msg: Optimize PropertyBindings, simplifying property paths when possible.
